title: Drophacked.
body:
Was just in a game as Renekton. Advancing on top second tower when my ping shoots up and "attempting to reconnect" appears and after a few minutes I quit. Check the network, everything is fine.

Every time I try to get back into game I am met with a black screen and the "Failed to Connect" error message. It really sucks. I wasn't doing terribly well but I guess someone wanted that tower to stay untouched.

I think it was the Shaco on the other team, just a hunch.

Edit:
Game is now over apparently. Waiting for stats.

Second Edit:
There is no list of those players in the recently played tab.
